name: True Crime: Myths, Legends, & More Podcast

episodes.title: Cult Survivor Isabella Young: Escaping the Unthinkable
episodes.description:
Cult Survivor Isabella Young: Escaping the Unthinkable

In this powerful and emotional episode, Jeff Ignatowski sits down with cult survivor Isabella Young, who bravely shares her harrowing journey from indoctrination to freedom. Isabella opens up about the manipulative tactics used by the cult, the psychological toll it took on her, and the strength it took to break free.

We explore:

How cult leaders gain and maintain control

The warning signs of cult recruitment

Isabella’s personal experience and road to healing

The myths and truths surrounding cult life


This is an eye-opening conversation you don’t want to miss.

👉 Subscribe, hit the bell, and share if you believe in exposing the truth behind cult manipulation.

#CultSurvivor #TrueCrimePodcast #IsabellaYoung #Cults #TrueCrimeMyths #JeffIgnatowski #SurvivorStories
